world.name: Museum of Planet of the Apes

rooms.description: You're standing at the entrance of the Museum of Natural History. There's a turnstile that takes tickets, but it's already been activated and opened.
This first exhibit shows the battle for earth, with the ape Caesar defeating the humans
Astronauts Taylor, Landon and Dodge are shown speaking to the ape scientist Cornelius.\n Odd. Humans can speak?
There is a museum worker here. It looks like they are refreshing the exhibit.\n'Pay no attention - this is the reboot-the-franchise exhibit'.

fixtures.name: Computer
fixtures.description: A computer with a password screen active.

items.name: Ticket
items.description: A complimentary museum ticket. It says ADMIT ONE, pwd = Align.
